## Week 1


### Wednesday Aug 21

* [First day survey](https://forms.gle/UiZrKtkPGFZ7Po8F9)
* Students will participate in a survey. We discuss some of the questions together.
* *S-IC.B: Make inferences and justify conclusions from sample surveys, experiments, and observational studies.*

### Thursday Aug 22

* We define population, parameter, sample, and statistic.
* We discuss how the goal of Statistics is to estimate population parameters from sample statistics.
* [Slides](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/p01_sam_stat_pop_prop.html)
* [Practice problems](https://chadworley.github.io/a2/u01/u01_shared1.html#Q1v1)
* Exercises are loaded on Canvas.
* *S-IC.A.1: Understand statistics as a process for making inferences to be made about population parameters based on a random sample from that population.*

### Friday Aug 23
